This was the first of Houston's famous [[Phi Slama Jama]] teams, led by [[Rob Williams (basketball)|Rob Williams]], [[Michael Young (basketball)|Michael Young]], [[Larry Micheaux]], and future [[Basketball Hall of Fame|Hall of Famer]] [[Clyde Drexler]]. Another future Hall of Famer, [[Hakeem Olajuwon]], played sparingly off the bench that season.
Houston, coached by [[Guy Lewis]], played its home games in the [[Hofheinz Pavilion]] in [[Houston, Texas]], and was then a member of the [[Southwest Conference]].
